channel.title: Static-access?
channel.description: Usually when I work on a wl-based source with eclipse, one of the most common errors are static access when calling the the field "players" from the PlayerHandler class through server.playerHandler. So I've been wondering is it ok to change it so it becomes PlayerHandler.players, or does it really not matter?

item.title: Static-access?
item.dc:creator: @BlueC4st BlueC4st
item.description:
@BlueC4st wrote:

Usually when I work on a wl-based source with eclipse, one of the most common errors are static access when calling the the field “players” from the PlayerHandler class through server.playerHandler. So I’ve been wondering is it ok to change it so it becomes PlayerHandler.players, or does it really not matter?

Read full topic
